N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.47 - Capitalization

State Regulations

The process of setting up expenditures as assets and
amortizing or depreciating these assets over time. Notes

451.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
